envsocty3LT3 0.0.1

Person and households statistics for traffic analysis zones in the Hamilton CMA.

Source: R/envsocty3LT3-package.R
hamilton_taz_ph.Rd

A table with statistics about persons and households by traffic analysis zones in the Hamilton CMA. The zoning system is GTA06. This file is a portion of the system used by the Transportation Tomorrow Survey in the Greater Toronto and Hamilton Area.

Usage

data(hamilton_taz_ph)

Format

A simple features object with 297 rows and 20 variables:

GTA06

Unique identifier of zone in the GTA06 system

population

Number of people in the traffic analysis zone by place of residence

drivers

Number of drivers (people who have a driver license) in the traffic analysis zone by place of residence

vehicles

Number of privately owned vehicles owned by households in the traffic analysis zone by place of residence

ft_workers

Number of people employed full-time in the traffic analysis zone by place of residence

pt_workers

Number of people employed part-time in the traffic analysis zone by place of residence

median_age

Median age of population in the traffic analysis zone

House

Number of households in the traffic analysis zone who live in dwelling of type House

Apartment

Number of households in the traffic analysis zone who live in dwelling of type Apartment

Townhouse

Number of households in the traffic analysis zone who live in dwelling of type Townhouse

total_dwellings

Total number of households in the traffic analysis zone

median_household_size

Median number of people per households in the traffic analysis zone

Inc_less_15k

Number of households in the traffic analysis zone with before-tax household income from all sources $14,999 or less

Inc_15k_to_40k

Number of households in the traffic analysis zone with before-tax household income from all sources between $15,000 and $39,999

Inc_40k_to_60k

Number of households in the traffic analysis zone with before-tax household income from all sources between $40,000 and $59,999

Inc_60k_to_100k

Number of households in the traffic analysis zone with before-tax household income from all sources between $60,000 and $99,999

Inc_100k_to_125k

Number of households in the traffic analysis zone with before-tax household income from all sources between $100,000 and $124,999

Inc_15k_to_40k

Number of households in the traffic analysis zone with before-tax household income from all sources $125,000 and greater

Inc_decline_dk

Number of households in the traffic analysis zone who declined to respond or did not know their before-tax household income from all sources

Source

Transportation Tomorrow Survey (http://dmg.utoronto.ca/transportation-tomorrow-survey/tts-introduction)

Data Guide available (http://dmg.utoronto.ca/pdf/tts/2016/2016TTS_DataGuide.pdf)

Examples

 data(hamilton_taz_ph)
 summary(hamilton_taz_ph)
